sentences.en: All those who try to falsify history are bound to end up at criminals in history.
sentences.cn: 一切伪造历史的人必然会成历史的罪人.

sentences.en: An adverse economic forecast will stimulate action intended to falsify it.
sentences.cn: 不利的经济预报将会刺激人们作出使预报失灵的行动.

sentences.en: False Sensory Input. You falsify one of the subject's senses.
sentences.cn: 伪造感觉: 你伪造受术者的一种感觉.

sentences.en: Fudge the figures; cook the books; falsify the data.
sentences.cn: 伪造数字; 伪造帐本; 伪造数据.

sentences.en: He pledged tough penalties on corporations and chief officers who falsify accounts.
sentences.cn: 他扬言将严惩作假帐的企业和主管人员.

sentences.en: I would falsify the attendance records by filling out membership cards with fictitious names.
sentences.cn: 我将在出席记录上弄虚作假,用伪造的名字填写会员证.

sentences.en: On his video - blog Mr Medvedev hit out at attempts to falsify history by former Soviet republics.
sentences.cn: 他的视频博客上,梅德韦德夫先生猛烈抨击篡改前苏维埃历史的企图.

sentences.en: She had to falsify the accounts so you wouldn't know about it.
sentences.cn: 为了不让您发现,她还得在日用开支账上做点手脚.

sentences.en: Test environments must be carefully controlled to prevent unauthorised modifications which might falsify test results.
sentences.cn: 测试环境必须仔细地控制避免非自动更新,这可能导致错误的测试结果.

sentences.en: The aim of science is to falsify theories and to replace them by better theories.
sentences.cn: 科学的目标在否定理论,并代之以更好的理论.

sentences.en: The file was altered to falsify the evidence.
sentences.cn: 文件被动了手脚，以此伪造证据。

sentences.en: They falsify or deny whatever doesn't suit their books.
sentences.cn: 他们篡改或者否定任何不符合他们意见的东西.

sentences.en: To alter or falsify ( accounts, for example ) for dishonest gain.
sentences.cn: 伪造为不正当目的伪造或篡改, 例如 ( 帐目 )

sentences.en: To be completely honest with Sears Holdings Corporation . They will not falsify records or coach workers.
sentences.cn: 必须诚信. 不可提供虚假记录或训导工人.

sentences.en: To change or falsify ( a text ) by introducing new or incorrect material.
sentences.cn: 篡改通过插入新的或不正当的材料改变或伪造 ( 课本 )
